# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-tosca-modeldesigner-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-tosca/model-designer/modeldesigner/distribution/modeldesigner-standalone/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/modeldesigner-standalone-1.1.0-20161230.012517-50-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz" && tar -xf common-tosca-modeldesigner-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz && rm -f common-tosca-modeldesigner-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8202
RUN echo Open-O common-tosca-modeldesigner 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-tosca/model-designer/modeldesigner/distribution/modeldesigner-standalone/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/modeldesigner-standalone-1.1.0-20161230.012517-50-linux.gtk.x86_64.tar.gz" > OPENO_VERSION
